properties.description: 소셜 고객 의견 데이터 Top키워드 블로그

source.oracleReaderQuery:
WITH VW_DATE AS
  (   
    SELECT -1 * (LEVEL-1)              AS SDATE
          ,(TRUNC(SYSDATE) - (LEVEL-1)) AS SDATE2
      FROM (
             SELECT TO_DATE('2021-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') AS STR_DATE
                   ,(TRUNC(SYSDATE))                   AS END_DATE            
                FROM DUAL
           )
    CONNECT BY LEVEL <= -1 * ( -1 + STR_DATE - END_DATE )   -- 일수 토탈 
  )
  SELECT round(SDATE) AS "date"
    FROM VW_DATE
  -- WHERE SDATE2 BETWEEN TO_DATE('2022-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') AND  TO_DATE('2022-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD')
   ORDER BY SDATE

query.value:
SELECT obsr_Spot_Code, to_char(now()- INTERVAL '2 day','YYYY-MM-DD') AS begin_Date
,to_char(now()-  INTERVAL '1 day','YYYY-MM-DD') AS end_Date 
FROM cd_ods.tb_apis_agri_weather_spot_code_t
;

delete from  cd_ods.tb_apis_agri_weather_t      
 WHERE  date_time = to_char(now(), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
 and obsr_Spot_Code = '@{item().obsr_Spot_Code}'
 ;
 
select 1 as success

select obsr_Spot_Code,  to_char(now(), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as date  
, to_char(now(), 'hh00') AS time    
from cd_ods.tb_apis_agri_weather_spot_code_t 
   ;

select CMONTH2 as cmonth      
       from CD_ODS.APS_SDC_PW_MST
       where CMONTH2 >= '201701'
         and BASE_DATE  <= DATE(NOW()) - interval '1 MONTHS'
      group by cmonth2 
      order by cmonth
